text: <!here|@here> heads up 11am client call is postponed til tomorrow-ish.  Plan for Design and Dev remains the same we just have that 1 hour back in our work day :slightly_smiling_face:
:ok_hand:
<@U0260V4K1> sorry in adv i have an iMac set up at your desk.  closest screen comp we had to the touch screen.  jason’s gonna set up and do some layout tests
You've been replaced <@U0260V4K1>
it’s fine for now - at some point i’m going to have to charge my computer though. Any chance we could move it to the library at some point?
yes!  asap
stand up

<@U0EL0GLEL> everything in the Google Slide doc should be fully spec’d now. colors will be updated after client feedback/approval. there will likely be extra slides for layout with addition of interstitial screens to be designed. but i think you’re golden with what we’ve got up to now.

<!here|@here> lots of comments/questions about canonical documentation have come up in the last week.  Elise is working on Podium documentation as we speak.  If anyone has questions about where to find things or ideas for organization - bring them to Rob and my attention and we’ll jump on it
agreed. can we archive the google slide doc now that trent did this, and use the invision as the single source of truth going forward?
Yes! I will move the comments Peter has been making over to Invision once the Invision has been updated with the most recent .PNGs. <@U0XJFPSRL> Please confirm in channel once Invision is up-to-date
cool, im good with my comments for now
<https://projects.invisionapp.com/share/R4AFT9Y9F>

text: I have the api endpoints that feed podium working aside from search. All the ones that support the explore by location are working and explained in my comments in the slide
<!here|@here> podium screen is set up in the Library, left wall
Thanks!
try not to bump the table or the tripod since it's all a little woogie
John's going to get me a screenshot to do a quick check on sizing
and we can try out real content later today

text: Updated with Annotations
Awesome! Thanks <@U0XJFPSRL>
I'm moving over Peter's comments, but team, please consider the Invision Prototypes canon and no longer refer to the Google Sldies

<@U02F9CXTL> i don’t want to forget that in the client preso, we talked about including any Display designs that have evolved since last meeting.  The idea is to give the client access to the latest designs, though we won’t “present” them
<@U026E0ZNR> - Can you export latest comps for client preso? Real main change would be updating the tag colors -
ok
added the search endpoints on the api, i think I have all the api endpoints for podium ready. they are annotated in invision, but search is simple /api/DATATYPE/search/TERM
<@U02F9CXTL> Updated comps: <https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B1KFvQr_SwVvZ0tNQmJCWXJzQzg>
get back to me if you want me to choose different color options for the tags.... tried intentionally not choosing core brand colors

Thanks <@U026E0ZNR> 
Can you update them here?
<https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1IKZHgPrShriCb1LYDwSsbp5nwvS61c16xqiTP21AjtM/edit#slide=id.g1c6ff47691_0_0>

Peter's comments from the Slides doc moved over to Invision. <@U2670DYLE> They are mostly all API calls for you. Waiting on getting you into Invision, but will note you in the comments once that's good
jstrand: need access
<@U0EL0GLEL> i’ve updated the Spec doc to have info for browse mode interstitials. also added page titles to show which screen appears for which state
Cool will review tomorrow.

<!here|@here> Let's get a code drop out to the client tomorrow morning so they can test build and deploy flow, as well as content scaling and alignment. Our current code is almost there. <@U2670DYLE> Would you please throw together a page for the podium that is one big button that says "Activate!!" that sends a message to the screens to wake them and load Peter's red-border test pattern? Once that's checked into our development repo, I'll test on our rig, then merge into the Gerrit development branch for deploy.
After that push, I'll send a note to Max et al 1) requesting code merges 2) requesting a Jenkins build and deploy and 3) with instructions on how to interact with the exhibit and what to look for.
I'll drop him a note tonight with the heads-up so it's not a surprise.
<@U02F9CXTL>: <@U0ML49XU0> <@U0B9N0HF0> regarding images, is the best practice to go through all the articles on that Google drive and try to find them? Or is there another route?
<@U0B9N0HF0>: <@U0ML49XU0> Do we know what time client meeting is at tomorrow? Podium needs work. Going to add attract mode into to a deck tonight.
<@U02F9CXTL>: noon. I held podium off agenda though
<@U0J6TE0CA>: they may have some specific high-res PR assets available. Thought I could ask about those since presentation is going to be canned? That work for you?
Works for me, if we think they can deliver!
<@U02E3CRMA> I pushed messaging update to development. I will sync with <@U0EL0GLEL> in the morning to determine what exact messages to send to the showtime service.
